mapper.select:
select es.*,IFNULL((select SUM(o1.amount) from order_info o1 where o1.express_id = es.id and o1.express_type = 0 and o1.status = 1),0) totalAmt, IFNULL((select SUM(o2.amount) from refund_order_info o2 where o2.express_id = es.id and o2.express_type = 0 and o2.status = 1),0) totalRefundAmt, IFNULL((select SUM(o3.amount) from order_info o3 where o3.express_id = es.id and o3.express_type = 0 and o3.status = 1 and o3.order_no like '16%'),0) totalReOrderAmt, (select count(1) from refund_order_info o4 where o4.express_id = es.id and o4.express_type = 0) refundNum, (select count(1) from order_info o5 where o5.express_id = es.id and o5.express_type = 0 and o5.order_no like '16%') reOrderNum, rp.area_name receiver_province_name, rc.area_name receiver_city_name, rd.area_name receiver_district_name from express_send es inner join regional_division_dict rp on rp.id = es.receiver_province_id inner join regional_division_dict rc on rc.id = es.receiver_city_id inner join regional_division_dict rd on rd.id = es.receiver_district_id
and (es.code like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or es.sender_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or es.sender_phone like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or es.receiver_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or es.receiver_phone like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and es.express_status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY es.id desc
select * from express_send es where es.code = #{expressSendNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select c.open_id,t.created_time from express_send t inner join customer c on c.id=t.customer_id where 1=1 and t.express_status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.is_deleted=0 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,t.created_time,now())>10
mapper.update: update express_send t set t.express_status=#{cancel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DATEDIFF(now(),t.created_time)>#{diff,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.express_status=#{ineffective,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update express_send t set t.service_amt = t.service_amt + #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t.id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
